content: textured mandala which can be used as a doily or put in a hoop as a wall hanging or dream-catcher finished size approx 32 cm/ 12 6 in diameter after blocking the pattern calls for scheepjes catona but you can use any yarn with a suitable hook please note that this will affect the size of your finished piece skill level intermediate stitches used single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet fp/bp-stitches fptr2/3tog cluster written pattern with some explanatory photos
